    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException
        This is the main method to run Program 4. In this method, the simulation class is instantiated. This method also contains the commands to read in the data strings and decides how to react to them. If there is bad data being read in, it is thrown in this method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • takeOff

        public void takeOff()
        This method executes the take off command. The method also displays the appropriate method on the console window.

      • departure

        public void departure()
        This method executes the departure command. The method also displays the appropriate method on the console window.

      • skipTime

        public void skipTime(int time)
        This method executes the update command. The system clock is incremented by 'time'. The method also displays the appropriate method on the console window.
        Parameters:
        time -

      • stats

        public void stats()
        This method generates and displays the simulation statistics.

      • endProgram

        public void endProgram()
        This method executes the final simulation statistics for the program.
